subject: Order enquiry
description_text:
Hi there I'm just wondering why it's taking so long to process my order? SSN5327

Just interested to know when I may be receiving it considering I've now made a few purchases from other stores since that have been processed and sent out.

Kind regards,
Jasper Cavadino

conversations.body_text: Hi Jasper Cavadino,  We apologize for the delay. Your order only arrived in our warehouse yesterday, but it was shipped last night.Â
